Sentencas: Chromium (III) oxide (Cr2O3)-doped LaSrFeO3 perovskite, La0.2Sr0.8Fe0.8Cr0.2O3-delta (LSFCO), is being considered as a potential material for applications in solid oxide fuel cells, gas separation membranes, and electrochemical reactors because of its high electro-catalytic activity.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: Similar to other perovskites, the performance and mechanical strength of LSFCO materials are significantly affected by environment and temperature.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: Here, we report a fracture gradient phenomenon in tubular C-ring-shaped LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: The graded reducing condition was produced by flushing N-2 on the outer side of the C-ring membranes at 1000 degrees C while keeping the inner side untreated.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: The rings were then diametrically compressed to fracture, and the resultant fracture morphology was analyzed with a scanning electron microscope (SEM).
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: A fracture gradient with three distinct regions across the thickness of the membranes was identified on the split surfaces.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: In the outer region of the C-ring specimen exposed to N-2, a mixed inter/transgranular fracture with a predominant intergranular pattern was observed.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: In the middle section of the fracture surface, a characteristic transgranular fracture of the perovskite grains was found.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: At the inner region of the ring, a mixed inter/transgranular fracture with a predominant transgranular pattern occurred.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: The mechanism of gradient fractures was attributed both to chemically induced stresses caused by oxygen diffusion and to the formation of a separate phase of oxygen-deficient perovskite in the parent perovskite.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: The stresses generated were modeled by a point defect model.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions

Sentencas: This work provides significant information on microstructure evolutions of tubular LSFCO membranes under graded reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Fracture modes in tubular LSFCO ceramic membranes under graded reducing conditions
